Performer:
Tsuruzawa Enza V (鶴澤燕三 (五))

Dates: '1943/04-'

Specialty: Shamisen

Notes: [Living National Treasure]; Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


– Click image to view.
